title: Panel Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered on satin
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 186 x 36 cm (6 ft. 1 1/4 in. x 14 3/16 in.)
description: Fragment from the center of the panel in ivory-colored silk satin embroidered in polychrome silks to form a central medallion of large-size flowers framed by ribbons and flowering vines in a field of meandering vines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel Fragment, 18th century. Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered on satin. 1968-13-4-a.
